title: Magnetic field at center of square of 4 wires

content.question: If the magnetic field at point <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="2.0 microteslas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>μ</mtext><mtext>T</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="a equals 0.10 meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="I" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
